page.title: 15RECREATION:CALEY F.C.
page.content: {CALEDONIAN FOOTBALL CLUB}PLAY AT TELFORD STREET PARK.THEY COMPETE IN THE HIGHLAND LEAGUE.IT IS THE CENTENARY OF THE CLUB'S FOUNDING IN OCTOBER 1985. A GAME IS TO BE ORGANISED AGAINST A PREMIER LEAGUE SIDE.A SPECIAL CENTENARY BOOK WILL BE PRINTED. THE TEAM MANAGER,PETER CORBETT, DOUBLES AS COMMERCIAL MANAGER AND THERE ARE SEVERAL FULL TIME STAFF ATTACHED TO THE SOCIAL CLUB. PLAYERS TRAIN TWICE WEEKLY BUT PRESEASON TRAINING IS THREE NIGHTS PER WEEK AND ALL DAY SATURDAY. THE CLUB RUNS YOUTH TEAMS TO ENCOURAGE YOUNG PLAYERS WITH TALENT.THEY CAN ARRANGE A TRIAL WITH A PROFESSIONAL SIDE FOR A PROMISING PLAYER. THE STADIUM CAN OFFICIALLY HOLD 6500,BUT THIS SEASON THE GAMES HAVE HAD AVERAGE CROWDS OF 500/600 PEOPLE.
